articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: US stocks dive as fears over coronavirus spread
articles.description: The Dow and the broader stock market ended deep in the red on Friday as fears over the spread of the Wuhan coronavirus tainted investor sentiment.

articles.author: Elizabeth Cohen and John Bonifield, CNN
articles.title: CDC confirms second US Wuhan coronavirus case
articles.description: A second case of Wuhan coronavirus in the United States has been identified in Chicago, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Friday in a press briefing.

articles.author: Danielle Wiener-Bronner, CNN Business
articles.title: McDonald's closes restaurants in five Chinese cities because of the coronavirus
articles.description: McDonald's has closed restaurants in five Chinese cities and is implementing new health protocols in the region as the deadly coronavirus continues to spread.

articles.title: What you need to know about coronavirus
articles.description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta looks at what you need to know about the Wuhan virus and coronaviruses like MERS and SARS - from what they are, to how you can treat them.

articles.title: 5 things to know for January 24: Impeachment, coronavirus, immigration, Iraq, Myanmar
articles.description: Here's what else you need to know to Get Up to Speed and Out the Door.
articles.content:
Get '5 things' in your inbox
If your day doesn't start until you've gotten up to speed on the latest headlines, then let us introduce you to your new favorite morning fix. Sign up here for the '5 Things' newsletter.

articles.author: Sherisse Pham, CNN Business
articles.title: Disney closes Shanghai park as virus spreads
articles.description: Disney is closing down its Shanghai resort over the lucrative Lunar New Year holiday, amid growing fears over the deadly Wuhan coronavirus.

articles.author: Julia Hollingsworth, CNN
articles.title: China canceling Lunar New Year festivities is a massive deal
articles.description: It's the most celebratory time of the year in China -- but in many cities, festivities have been called off.
articles.content:
Hong Kong (CNN)It's the most celebratory time of the year in China -- but in many cities, festivities have been called off.

articles.title: Social media videos appear to show patients overcrowd hospitals
articles.description: Social media videos appear to show patients overcrowd hospitals in Wuhan -- a city under partial lockdown -- due to the Wuhan coronavirus outbreak. CNN's David Culver reports.

articles.author: Michelle Toh, CNN Business
articles.title: Asian markets are quiet after a turbulent week
articles.description: Asian markets were mostly muted Friday morning on the eve of Lunar New Year celebrations, signaling a cautious approach after a broad sell-off the previous day over growing coronavirus fears.

articles.title: Global carmakers and luxury brands hit as virus shuts down China's 'motor city'
